category: Herbs that Nourish Yin and Moisten Dryness

action.primary: Nourishes Yin, tonifies the Blood and moistens Dryness

indications: Restlessness, insomnia, indigestion, scalds, hemoptysis, vomiting, dysentery, hematochezia, vaginal bleeding during pregnancy, furuncle, indigestion in infants

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with hypertension, coronary heart disease and atherosis.
